headline: Jim Cramer Says That He Likes TJX
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer Recently Discussed. Cramer noted that the company had a “terrific quarter,” as he said: … I don’t believe in the white-collar job apocalypse. Maybe AI can eventually replace most of the positions, and that’s very bearish, but it’s going to take many, many […]

headline: TJX Ups Shareholder Returns With US$3b Buyback And Higher Dividend Valuation In Focus
summary: TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) announced a new $3b stock repurchase program. The company also approved a 13% dividend increase. Both decisions followed its reported fourth quarter and full year results. TJX Companies, the owner of off price retailers like T.J. Maxx and Marshalls, sits at the center of discount focused retail, a segment many investors watch when consumers are value conscious. With a new $3b buyback authorization and a higher dividend, management is signaling how it plans to return...
